content: Introducing FHIR to new people always leeds to new questions - which is awesome. Here's one: why are all default constraints always listed on profiles? Shouldn't it be considered default to colapse them in some way - and couldn't the constraints inferred by the IG be highlighted or so @Grahame Grieve / @Lloyd McKenzie ? Take for instance http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7dk/dk-core/StructureDefinition-dk-core-patient.html#constraints - only a trained eye can see what is actually constraints inferred by the rules of the IG.
Oh yes- and the error/warningInfo level is still not present, but we've discussed that before on https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179252-IG-creation/topic/Warnings.20in.20contraints.20table
you might like to join this discussion then
